**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-17T15:59:31Z" title="05/17/2015 03:59  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 17, 2015</time> by spaceBrezel**

> 
> Nice. I really really wished they introduced a 'real' and working cargo bay door like that. Also a nice idea of landing rovers and stuff on other planets when introduced to a spaceplane.

Meanwhile you can make those hahaha, actually they work fine as long as there's no air coming from inside the cargo bay so they aren't subject to that much airflow and they don't interfere much with the flying characteristics.

> 
> How do you make those nice pictures? Are you a wizard? o\_Ã‚Â°

And yes, I used Kronal Vessel Viewer, but be aware it has some sort of memory leak and lags the game a lot and causes lots of crashes
